needs.NeedsEnergyModal.FeedingSummary.translation: Cozmo needs to be fed to keep him healthy.

needs.NeedsEnergyModal.Instruction1.translation: Grab any Cube that is pulsing blue.

needs.NeedsEnergyModal.Instruction2.translation: Shake that Cube until all lights glow brightly.

needs.NeedsEnergyModal.Instruction3.translation: Place the Cube in front of Cozmo.

needs.NeedsEnergyModal.FeedingComplete.translation: Cozmo is fed! Now he is ready to play.

needs.NeedsRepairModal.RepairSummary.translation: Cozmo needs to be tuned up in order to keep him healthy.

needs.NeedsRepairModal.RepairButtonsInst.translation: Tap the regions to be repaired.

needs.NeedsRepairModal.TuneUpInstruction.translation: Use the buttons on the right to recreate the arrow pattern. Then tap Calibrate.

needs.NeedsRepairModal.TuneUpComplete.translation: Cozmo is all tuned up. Come back again when his meter is more empty.
